_sText: Inspiration for this map came from just playing on it, its boring when you can see the zombies coming right for you...BUT when you cant see whats around the next corner it makes it even more fun..kinda creepy actually......on the bad side..theres a problem with the props downstairs..idk why but they shine like greyish white when there shouldnt be any light down there,but look normal when you shine your flash light on them...so if anyone knows how to fix that i will gladly do it. thats why I left it version 1, because when I get more into hammer I plan on fixing it.
